#summary Showcase implemented with JEE and Vaadin

= Technologies = 

== View ==
 * Vaadin 6.5-SNAPSHOT

== Service ==
 * JEE 6

== Persistence == 
 * JPA 2.0

= Start up help =

== Prerequisites ==
 * JDK 6
 * Maven >= 2.2

== Steps ==
 # [http://code.google.com/p/coolcoders-showcase/source/checkout Checkout] project.
 # Go into Folder "showcase/web/vaadin-jee"
 # execute "mvn clean package embedded-glassfish:run"
 # Open "http://localhost:8080/showcase-vaadin" in a browser.
